name: APPLiA Bulgaria
headAddress: Sofia Park, Building 16 V, office 2.1., fl. 2
goal:
APPLiA Bulgaria is an association of the manufacturers of electrical domestic appliances in Bulgaria, which works actively for the sustainable development and competitiveness of the industry of domestic electrical appliances by:
• Representing the industry’s interests in front of the governmental and public bodies and institutions of the Republic of Bulgaria and the European Union as well as other international institutions and organizations
• Participating actively in the development of legal acts through building stable relationships with the governmental and municipal authorities, with governmental agencies, creating contacts with the non-governmental sector on the ground of mutual benefit and partnership
• Supporting its members by informing them about the current status and the forthcoming changes in the regulatory framework in the field of electrical appliances as well as changes in the areas of economic, technical and technological development of the sector
• Promoting the issues of importance to the industry of domestic electrical appliances to the general public
interests: Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
• Revision of the Ecodesign and Energy Labelling Framework Directives
• European Commission’s Ecodesign Working Plan 2015-2017
• Product safety and market surveillance
• Measures on enforcing and developing the WEEE legislation
• Resource efficiency and Circular economy
• Smart grids, smart appliances, connected objects
• Consumer rights
Digital Single Market
